trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to the value of a property.
<xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression> can be used to represent a reference to the value of a property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression> 可以用于表示对属性的值的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> property specifies the object that contains the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A>属性指定包含要引用的属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression.PropertyName%2A> property specifies the name of the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression.PropertyName%2A>属性指定要引用的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: This object does not have a property to indicate whether the reference is used in a `get` or `set`.
trans-unit.target: 此对象不具有一个属性以指示是否在使用的引用`get`或`set`。

trans-unit.source: If the property reference occurs on the left, assigned to, side of an assignment statement, then it is a `set`.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性引用出现在左侧，分配给、 一端赋值语句，则它是`set`。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates use of a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression> to refer to a property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression>以引用的属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> that indicates the object that contains the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />，它指示包含要引用的属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to reference.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression" /> class using the specified target object and property name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目标对象和属性名称初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要引用的属性名。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to reference.
Gets or sets the object that contains the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含要引用属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> that indicates the object that contains the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />，它指示包含要引用的属性的对象。
